name: @pxblue/icons-mui
description: PX Blue icons for Material UI
author: px-blue <pxblue@eaton.com>

scripts.refresh: yarn upgrade && cd mui-icon-builder && yarn upgrade && cd ..
scripts.mui: cd mui-icon-builder && babel-node --config-file ./babel.config.js builder.js --output-dir ../icons --svg-dir ../node_modules/@pxblue/icons-svg && cd .. && yarn babelfy
scripts.svgr: npx @svgr/cli -d icons node_modules/@pxblue/icons-svg --template mui-template.js --expand-props none --no-dimensions && yarn babelfy
scripts.publish:full: yarn clear && yarn refresh && yarn mui && npm version patch && npm publish
